3rdparty.body:
ARC Annoucement

My ARC Is Getting a New Look

You’re in the right place! We’re proud to announce we’ve updated My ARC design and content. You can now find pertinent ARC content on topics that will enhance your business — including product updates and tips, research, traveler trends, fraud prevention and more — directly alongside the products you use on a regular basis.

Here are a few things you need to know:

  • Tools and products accessed from My ARC did NOT change in functionality or design.
  • The tools and products you use remain on My ARC via the “Tools” drop-down menu on the left-hand side of the screen.
The Latest
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

A recent case study with Atout France revealed that, by using Global Agency Pro, monthly sales reports take a third of the time to complete, while channel performance reports and ROI tracking on marketing initiatives takes half the time it used to.

Read the Case Study

Looking for the cheapest day to book a flight? The best day to travel? Get the answers plus other worldwide travel trends identified by ARC and Expedia.

Get The Report

ARC Featured Product: Market Locator

ARC's Market Locator tool provides insight into U.S. air travel purchases and passenger behavior, helping airport professionals identify opportunities, build loyalty and improve service.

LearnMore

carrier.body:
ARC Annoucement

My ARC Is Getting a New Look

You’re in the right place! We’re proud to announce we’ve updated My ARC design and content. You can now find pertinent ARC content on topics that will enhance your business — including product updates and tips, research, traveler trends, fraud prevention and more — directly alongside the products you use on a regular basis.

Here are a few things you need to know:

  • Tools and products accessed from My ARC did NOT change in functionality or design.
  • The tools and products you use remain on My ARC via the “Tools” drop-down menu on the left-hand side of the screen.
The Latest
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

The Best Practices for Effective Debit Memo Resolution and Prevention include guidelines for airlines, travel agencies, global distribution systems (GDSs) and ARC.

Learn More

A recent case study with Aeroflot revealed that by using ARC’s Memo Analyzer, Aeroflot’s team was able to clear 250 agency debit memos, approximately $150,000, in just a six-month period.

Read the Case Study

Missed a webinar? Visit the Carrier Education page for webinars and training videos on ARC products, reporting, settlement, agency management, industry trends and much more.

Learn More

Looking for the cheapest day to book a flight? The best day to travel? Get the answers plus other worldwide travel trends identified by ARC and Expedia.

Get The Report

ARC & NDC

ARC supports the full spectrum of airline distribution models in the travel agency channel by providing flexible transaction processing workflows, billing and settlement, and outputs that enable airlines and agencies to efficiently manage their partnerships.

Find Out More

Why Memo Manager's Flex Fields are a Game Changer: Q&A with Direct Travel

Lisa Rollo, an accounting project analyst for Direct Travel, sat down with ARC to discuss her successes using ARC's Memo Manager.

Gain Memo Manager Insights

Mike Premo on What NDC Means for Corporate Travel Managers

On The Company Dime, Chief Executive Officer Mike Premo shares his insights on how industrywide changes in airline distribution, including NDC, may affect booking, servicing and contract management for corporate travel managers — and why industrywide collaboration and communication are critical.

Find Out More

ARC & NDC

My ARC Is Getting a New Look

You’re in the right place! We’re proud to announce we’ve updated My ARC design and content. A recent case study with Atout France revealed that, by using Global Agency Pro, monthly sales reports take a third of the time to complete, while channel performance reports and ROI tracking on marketing initiatives takes half the time it used to. Global Agency Pro aided in uncovering not only travel market trends but also new sales strategies based on agency type, as well as helped build new relationships with agency partners.

login.body:
What is NDC & how does it work? At today’s @ASTAAgents Corporate Advisory Committee Meeting, ARC’s VP of Product, Doug Mangold, answers these questions & gives a comprehensive view of #NDC in the air travel industry. Learn more about ARC supporting NDC

Learn More

Despite devastating hurricanes in late 2017, air ticket purchases to areas less impacted remain very strong in 2018. Overall, average ticket prices decreased 4% #ARCdata #SpringBreak

Learn More

The theme for this year’s TravelConnect is “Transforming Together” and will feature Dan Clay, Wayne Best and Holly Hegeman. #TravelConnect2018

Learn More
login.ads:
Welcome to My ARC

ARC Annoucement

My ARC Is Getting a New Look

You’re in the right place — UAT My ARC! We’re proud to announce that we are updating the design and content on My ARC. You will soon be able to find pertinent ARC content on topics that will enhance your business – including product updates and tips, research, traveler trends, fraud prevention and more — directly alongside the products you use on a regular basis.

Here are a few things you need to know:

  • Tools and products accessed from My ARC did NOT, nor will they, change in functionality or design.
  • The link to access My ARC will not change.
  • The tools and products you use remain on My ARC via the “Tools” drop-down menu on the left-hand side of the screen.

Additionally, it has come to our attention that, in some instances, agencies use robotics to enter and access data via My ARC tools and products. While we do not endorse this practice, we do not anticipate a disruption, as the ARC tools and products you use will not change in functionality whatsoever.
